artist: Engraver: Conrad Waumans; Artist: After David Bailii; Publisher: Jan Meyssens
description: Self portrait; waist length portrait of man looking left;
inscription:
Signature, Title and Inscription

in plate below image in black: [DAVID BALLII/ At en son origine a Leyden ou il tient encor sa residence/ il set un fort bon peintre en pourtraicts, et en vie coue:/ estant fort en la desseinne a la plume etc./ David Bally pinxit  Coenr. Waumans Sculp. Io Meyssens exc.]; below image in pencil [1-67]
title: Portrait of David Ballii
